name: Exploring the Impact of Feedback on Player Experience In Games
name_original: Exploring the Impact of Feedback on Player Experience In Games
description:
You will play a game for 3 rounds. When you lose the level you will be asked to answer a set of questions. Your answers to these questions will be recorded and used for research purposes.

Use W,A,S,D to move.

Right Mouse button to shoot a bullet.

Left Mouse Button to shoot a rocket.
